title: Map of Trade and Extent of Islam - conclusion

content.question: Which of the following conclusions can be drawn from the information included on the map?

choices.label: Cattle were exported from Africa to Asia.
Great Zimbabwe traded gold with the Swahili Coast.
Ivory was an important trade good for the Indian Ocean maritime trade.
Most of the gold exchanged in the Indian Ocean came from West Africa.

content.answer: Great Zimbabwe traded gold with the Swahili Coast.

topic.text: 1.8: Culture and Trade in Southern and East Africa

skill.text: 2.D: Describe and draw conclusions from patterns, trends, and limitations in data, making connections to relevant course content.
